___registration_endpoint.description: The OAuth 2.0 / OpenID Connect client registration endpoint URL.

___userinfo_encryption_enc_values_suppor.description: List of the supported JWE encryption methods for securing the claims returned at the UserInfo endpoint, omitted or empty if none.

___response_modes_supported.description: List of the supported OAuth 2.0 response_mode values.

___request_uri_parameter_supported.description: Specifies whether the request_uri parameter is supported.

___display_values_supported.description: List of the supported display parameters.

___id_token_encryption_enc_values_suppor.description: List of the supported JWE encryption methods for securing the issued ID tokens, omitted or empty if none.

___userinfo_signing_alg_values_supported.description: List of the supported JWS algorithms for securing the claims returned at the UserInfo endpoint.

___token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_value.description: List of the supported JWS algorithms for JWT-based client authentication at the OAuth 2.0 token endpoint, omitted or empty if none.

___revocation_endpoint.description: The OAuth 2.0 token revocation endpoint URL.

___token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported.description: List of the supported client authentication methods at the OAuth 2.0 token endpoint.

___response_types_supported.description: List of the supported OAuth 2.0 response_type values.

___claims_locales_supported.description: List of the supported OpenID Connect claims locales, omitted or empty if none.

___op_policy_uri.description: The privacy policy document URL, omitted if none.

___claim_types_supported.description: List of the supported OpenID Connect claim types.

___request_object_signing_alg_values_sup.description: List of the supported JWS algorithms for securing OpenID Connect request objects.

___introspection_endpoint.description: The OAuth 2.0 token introspection endpoint URL.

___userinfo_endpoint.description: The OpenID Connect UserInfo endpoint URL.

___ui_locales_supported.description: List of the supported UI locales, omitted or empty if none.

___scopes_supported.description: List of the supported scope values. Certain values may be omitted for privacy reasons.

___subject_types_supported.description: List of the supported subject (end-user) identifier types.

___issuer.description: The server identifier, typically the base URL of the Connect2id server, using the https scheme, e.g. https://c2id.com

___op_tos_uri.description: The terms of service document URL, omitted if none.

___acr_values_supported.description: List of the supported Authentication Context Class References.

___request_object_encryption_enc_values_.description: List of the supported JWE encryption methods for securing OpenID Connect request objects, omitted or empty if none.

___claims_parameter_supported.description: Specifies whether the claims request parameter is supported.

___request_object_encryption_alg_values_.description: List of the supported JWE encryption algorithms for securing OpenID Connect request objects, omitted or empty if none.

___grant_types_supported.description: List of the supported OAuth 2.0 grant types.

___id_token_signing_alg_values_supported.description: List of the supported JWS algorithms for securing the issued ID tokens.

___claims_supported.description: List of the supported OpenID Connect claims. Certain values may be omitted for privacy reasons.

___id_token_encryption_alg_values_suppor.description: List of the supported JWE algorithms for securing the issued ID tokens, omitted or empty if none.

___userinfo_encryption_alg_values_suppor.description: List of the supported JWE encryption algorithms for securing the claims returned at the UserInfo endpoint, omitted or empty if none.

___request_parameter_supported.description: Specifies whether the request parameter is supported.

___require_request_uri_registration.description: Specifies whether request URIs must be registered for a client.

___code_challenge_methods_supported.description: List of the supported transformation methods on the authorisation code verifier for Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE).

___jwks_uri.description: The public server JWK set URL.
